thread.section_title: SparkTrust Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of SparkTrust | sparktrust.com
thread.title: Teresa

author: Teresa
title: Teresa
text: Almost every time I try to watch a movie online on one of the free sites, I would receive a warning about malware and to call a number to fix or I would lose all my data and information and that MicroSoft would be shutting down my computer. I bought protection but apparently it did not work. Well, Spark Trust got rid of that warning more than once and cleaned up the computer and then it ran fine. This is a most wonderful, helpful program.
